actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that enlisted members of the uniformed services as well as officers shall be entitled to receive a basic allowance for subsistence in addition to per diem while traveling on temporary duty.

summary.text: Entitles enlisted members of the uniformed services to a basic allowance for subsistence in addition to a per diem allowance while traveling on temporary duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that enlisted members of the uniformed services as well as officers shall be entitled to receive a basic allowance for subsistence in addition to per diem while traveling on temporary duty.
